text:
From: Kazara Aikaterini <akazara@eurobank.gr> 
Sent: Friday, January 10, 2025 1:51 PM
To: Athanasios Karantzis <akarantzis@tibiel.com>; Backoffice <Backoffice@tibiel.com>; Aneta Ivanova <a.ivanova@tibiel.com>
Cc: Stoyan Vasilev <s.vasilev@tibiel.com>; Palamidas Andreas <anpalamidas@eurobank.gr>; GCM (General Clearing Member) <GCM@eurobank.gr>; Sales and Relationship Management <SalesandRelationshipManagement@eurobank.gr>
Subject: RE: TIBIEL Ltd Νatural Gas - GCM Comm 12/2024

 

Dear all,

 

Attached you will find the invoice regarding the Clearing services commissions.

 

 

Kind regards, 

 

General Member Clearing Teams

 

 

 

From: Kotsiou Eirini <EKotsiou@eurobank.gr> 
Sent: Tuesday, January 7, 2025 4:09 PM
To: Athanasios Karantzis <akarantzis@tibiel.com>; Backoffice <Backoffice@tibiel.com>; Aneta Ivanova <a.ivanova@tibiel.com>
Cc: s.vasilev@tibiel.com; Palamidas Andreas <anpalamidas@eurobank.gr>; GCM (General Clearing Member) <GCM@eurobank.gr>; Sales and Relationship Management <SalesandRelationshipManagement@eurobank.gr>
Subject: TIBIEL Ltd Νatural Gas - GCM Comm 12/2024

 

Dear all,

 

Attached you will find the analysis regarding Clearing services commissions provided concerning the Natural Gas platform for 12/24.

  

If we do not receive any notice from your side until the 10/01/25, we will proceed with the debit of your bank account and send you the invoice. 

 

We are at your disposal for any further clarification.

 

Kind regards, 

General Member Clearing Teams

EUROBANK

ΠΑΝΑΓΟΥΛΗ & ΣΙΝΙΟΣΟΓΛΟΥ

142 34 Nea Ionia, Athens

+30 214 40 46724 Kotsiou Eirini

+30 214 40 63244 Papagianneli Menia

+30 214 40 63242 Kazara Kaiti

P Think before you print.

* Think before you print.


Disclaimer:
This e-mail is confidential. If you are not the intended recipient, you should not copy it, re-transmit it, use it or disclose its contents, but should return it to the sender immediately and delete the copy from your system.
Eurobank S.A. is not responsible for, nor endorses, any opinion, recommendation, conclusion, solicitation, offer or agreement or any information contained in this communication.
Eurobank S.A. cannot accept any responsibility for the accuracy or completeness of this message as it has been transmitted over a public network. If you suspect that the message may have been intercepted or amended, please call the sender.
